A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a perfect film\, but a surprising spectacle to say the least. There are many things wrong with it with plot holes and poor writing taking the cake\, but that doesn't make the good parts any less epic or enjoyable. Instead of seeing a rehash of Episode V -- having seen a \"remake\" of Episode IV with Episode VII -- we have a fresh story that suffers from the bad case of the hiccups.
